tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE recidivism_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
participant_name VARCHAR(50),
age INT,
release_date DATE,
recidivism_status BOOLEAN,
reentry_program VARCHAR(100));

CREATE TABLE reentry_programs (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    success_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE ReentryPrograms (
  program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  success_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE inmates(
    inmate_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    inmate_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sentence_start_date DATE,
    sentence_end_date DATE,
    crime_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE recidivism_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inmate_id INT,
    incarceration_date DATE,
    release_date DATE,
    crime_type VARCHAR(50),
    recidivism_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE reentry_programs (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(100),
    program_type VARCHAR(50),
    program_duration INT,
    success_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE inmate_details (
    inmate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    education_level VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE program_participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inmate_id INT,
    program_id INT,
    enrollment_date DATE,
    completion_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE program_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_id INT,
    participant_id INT,
    rating INT,
    feedback_text TEXT
)
